Articles.Content:
[EDIT: ADDED MORE VIDEOS]

Here are some screenshots of the mun rover,

what I did was I dropped an altair engine from 5 meters, letting it destroy

while I fired retro-boosters touching down at 9 meters per second,

that cart has epic suspension:

I tipped over the cart because I felt jebediah telling me to go full speed over that hill.

But luckily i still angled the ascent engine up and fired away,

believe it or not,

my 1st mission with jeb since the demo 0.13

Here are some videos:

http://beta.xfire.com/videos/58bada

http://beta.xfire.com/videos/58baf1

http://beta.xfire.com/videos/58bb1e
Did you edited the save file to get jeb, cause i know u did.

Lol, wats the max descent speed for the mun?

My ascent fuel ran out and I had to jettison it,

I touchdowned at 15 meters per second, and i was using RSC tanks,

thouh landed safely and I\'m sending feed.

Max desent speed really depends on the weight of the object and the strength of its landing legs/wheels.. so it varies quite a lot.

I\'m not a mathmaticion so i have no idea what the formulae for working it out would be.
